casebody.data:
No. 10-1266. Michael R. Levy, Independent Executor of the Estate of Meyer Levy, Deceased, Petitioner v. United States. 563 U.S. 1009, 131 S. Ct. 2914,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1247,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3874. May 23, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 402 Fed. Appx. 979.
